summary: A father returns to his old hometown with his young family. Events force him to face the small town's xenophobia.
cast: Lasse Rimmer|Lene Nystrøm|Fanny Bornedal|Jacob Ottensten|Mogens Pedersen|Lone Lindorff|Jens Andersen|Pernille Vallentin|Bojan Navojec|Kim Kold|Alexandre Willaume|Anders Budde Christensen|Daniel Engstrup|Bob Anders|Helle Halsboe|Karin Norrinder|Henrik Prip|Andreas Bo Pedersen|Torben Vadstrup|Anders Peter Sandberg|Kurt Ravn|Sonja Richter|Lene Mølgaard|Jane Albrektsen|Erling Agergaard|Morten Bjørn|Claus Gøran Eklund|Alice Haaber
title: Fri os fra det onde
